game_description: First day on the planet Airus at Intek robotics military facility, chaos breaks out and you are the only hope in stopping the robotic army from being unleashed onto their creators! Shift-Shock is a casual shooter combining Sci Fi guns with Sci Fi mele weapons. -Single player -13 missions - Has a few experimental vehicle missions -more missions coming in future updates including more vehicle missions This casual shooter has a large range of weapons and some large levels with large play zones.
